https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fKsONTEt8vI4XOntWLm0gyrZ9h4.jpg Trisha, a Filipino transgender woman, suddenly dies while being crowned in a beauty pageant. Her last wish was to be presented as a different celebrity on each night of her wake, but her conservative father wants to bury her as a man. Die Beautiful
